meanings.definition: A fast or lively tempo in music.
meanings.sent1: The band played an uptempo song that got everyone dancing.
meanings.sent2: I love listening to uptempo music when I need a boost of energy.
meanings.sent3: The uptempo beat of the song made even the shyest person tap their foot.
meanings.sent4: Her heart raced at an uptempo pace as she waited for the concert to start.
meanings.sent5: The uptempo rhythm of the drums echoed through the entire hall.

meanings.sent1: The uptempo pace of the race left the competitors breathless.
meanings.sent2: She walked at an uptempo speed to catch the bus before it left.
meanings.sent3: The uptempo squirrel darted across the park, gathering nuts in a hurry.
meanings.sent4: Time seemed to move at an uptempo rate as the deadline approached.
meanings.sent5: The uptempo flow of traffic made her drive cautiously to avoid accidents.
